attributes.action: urge the reinstatement of the Russell Brand Show to BBC Radio 2.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people who never even cared about Russell Brand were moved to complain about his 'innapropriate' behaviour despite only reading about it in the right-wing press in highly inflammatory articles. We the undersigned show our love to Russell and his radio Show and urge him to continue his Show as soon as possible, without letting the 'man' get him down. There is a revolution on the way after all!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
